about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Kolkata based BCPL Railway Infrastructure Limited (BRIL) is a company engaged in the business of Railway Infrastructure Development involving design, drawing, supply, Erection and Commissioning of 25KV, 50Hz Single Phase Traction Overhead Equipment.

Some of the major clients of the company are various zones of the Indian Railways like Eastern Railway, South Eastern Railway, South East Central Railway, Northern Railway, East Coast Railway, North Frontier Railway, East Central Railway, Central Organisation For Railway Electrification (CORE) as well as large Public and Private Sector Undertakings like RITES Ltd., Durgapur Projects Ltd., Adhunik Group, Usha Martin Industries Ltd, Essel Mining Industries Ltd., Jindal Steel and Power Ltd., Haldia Energy Limited, Rungta Mines and Electrosteel etc.

The total revenues of the company stood at Rs 5,063.59 Lakhs, Rs 3,498.76 lakhs and Rs 2,573.92 Lakhs for the fiscal year 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

The PAT was Rs 404.55 Lakhs, Rs 127.20 Lakhs and Rs 96.11 Lakhs for the fiscal year 2018, 2017 and 2016 respectively.

Competitive Strengths-

1. Highly experienced in a niche market
2. Strong roaster of clients
3. Good track record of growth

faqs.question: What is the BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO?
faqs.answer:
BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO is a SME IPO of 4860000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹17.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹35 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on October 5, 2018, and closes on October 19, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: You can apply in BCPL Railway Infrastructure BRIL IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
